branchCategory.name: High Rigidity Belt Drive
branchCategory.description: The LEJB is a slider type electric actuator available exclusively with an AC servo motor. The actuator features a substantially wider load mounting platform than the LEFB, supported internally by a double axis linear guide for reduced moment deflection. The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, improved positioning repeatability, and a high-load size 63 model exclusive to LEJ. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.

branchItem.name: LEJB, Electric Actuator, High Rigidity Slider Type, Belt Drive (AC Servo Motor 100/200W)
branchItem.description: The LEJB is a slider type electric actuator available exclusively with an AC servo motor. The actuator features a substantially wider load mounting platform than the LEFB, supported internally by a double axis linear guide for reduced moment deflection. The AC servo motor enables higher speed and acceleration, improved positioning repeatability, and a high-load size 63 model exclusive to LEJ. The drivers are pulse input type, with both incremental and absolute encoder options and 17- or 18-bit resolution.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 40, 63 <LI>Maximum speed: 3000 mm/s <LI>Maximum stroke: 3000 mm <LI>Positioning repeatability: ±0.04mm <LI>Motor available with either incremental 17-bit or absolute 18-bit encoder
</LI></UL>
